author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
#### PR description:

Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_12_3_X`.

This is the PR for the `master` branch, which will then be backported to `12_3_X` (which is currently the release used for HLT-menu development for Run 3).

Includes the integration of the following JIRA tickets.

  - [CMSHLT-2249](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2249): [L1T] Check of the usage of L1 seeds in the current HLT menu for Run 3.
  - [CMSHLT-2258](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2258): [L1T] Renaming of some L1 seeds in the new L1T menu for Run 3.
  - [CMSHLT-2242](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2242): [HIG] Triggers for boosted H->bb ParticleNet.
  - [CMSHLT-2253](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2253): [HIG] Triggers for boosted H->TauTau hadronic signatures.

#### PR validation:

TSG tests.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: HLT menu development for `12_3_X` [`12_4_X`]
